page.title: 20Life Styles:
page.content: We are very fortunate living in a rural area. We can grow or rear our own food. This means we can decide about use of chemicals and pesticides. Breeds of animals and varieties of vegetables can be grown for quality and flavour.Our free range hens give us eggs fresh from the nest. We can walk round the garden or orchard pick ing and eating the fruit.Some people supplement their income by selling surplus fruit,vegetables and plants.We have a very successful summer show in the Village hall run by the W.I.but open to all.Bees pollenate crops and produce honey.In this area with a wide selection of blossom we can have a good variety of honey.From the fells we can collect the heather honey with its distinctive flavour.Hobbies include woodwork,needlework,painting, carving,climbing and canoeing.
